refnamediv.refpurpose: Modify the description of the selected event

refsynopsisdiv.title: Calling Sequence
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: btkSetEventDescription(h, label, desc) events = btkSetEventDescription(h, label, desc) [events, eventsInfo] = btkSetEventDescription(h, label, desc)

listitem.para: The handle used to represent an acquisition.
A non empty string to represent the label of event.
A string to represent the new description.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Modify the description of the selected event.
The format of the outputs events and eventsInfo are structures presented in details in the function btkGetEvents.
The acquisition is represented by the handle h. This handle is obtained by the use of a btk* function.
